EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Follow Up - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: You were missed at Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
You were missed at Accelerate 2015! We had a wonderful day packed with over 200 attendees participating in presentations, workshops, networking, exploring the exhibitions, and taking pictures at the photo booth.
You can catch up on everything you missed by checking out the event photos, highlights, and videos from Accelerate 2015 now up on our website <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/>. Make sure to check back as we add more, including the presentation videos!
One of the most exciting parts of the day was the official release of Tosca Testsuite 9.0. Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/what-is-new/9-0/> to learn more about the new Tosca Testsuite and find demos of all the new features.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. We hope to see you at Accelerate 2016!
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Accelerate Team
